Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2008 01:02AM Dmac wrote: I'm nervous, new to all this.  I was diagnosed with an 8 cm tumor, 4 nodes out of 7 involved, stage III.  I'm in a daze, I have 2 boys away at college, doing great, and twin 12 year old daughters at home.  Teenage girls need a mommy, and my boys need me too.  My husband is great, but I am so scared.  I'm healing from the mastectomy nicely, but treatment won't start till I'm all healed. Any words of encouragement from other Stage IIIers?
Posts.Title: Cancer spreading to lymph nodes pippadoll Curlylocks
